fields.headline: Corrections and clarifications
fields.bodyText: • An editorial misdescribed ethnic Kazakh campaigner Serikzhan Bilash as “a prominent Uighur exile” when referring to his recent detention in Kazakhstan (The mass detention camps in Xinjiang are shocking, and it is time to say so, 18 March, page 2, Journal). • Further school climate strikes are planned for 12 April, not 15 April as we had it (‘More than 1.4 million’ took part in school climate strike, 20 March, page 19). • Other recently corrected articles include: ‘We never thought it would happen’: Thomas Heatherwick’s $200m gamble Brad Mehldau and Britten Sinfonia review – jazz virtuoso finds greater focus in first concerto Buyer beware: Amsterdam seeks to ban buy-to-let on newbuild homes How we made Hair
